description: This Dart file defines a Flutter widget 'NoteCard' that renders a preview of a note, including title, content snippet, pinned state, and last updated time. It is intended for UI presentation in a note-taking app.

classes.name: NoteCard
classes.description: A widget that displays a preview of a note, including title, content, pin state, and last updated timestamp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the Flutter widget tree for NoteCard, rendering the note's visual layout.
